version_description:
Retail Favourites now available! If you have linked your in-store membership to your online account, you’ll now be able to play your Favourites saved in-store with the Lott App.

Keep an eye out for more exciting updates coming soon which will make playing in-store even easier!

Thanks for playing! To always ensure you have the best experience with the Lott App we bring updates to the App Store regularly. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on - we’ll always highlight any new features for you in the App.

Retail Favourites now available! If you have linked your in-store membership to your online account, you’ll now be able to play your Favourites saved in-store with the Lott App.

Keep an eye out for more exciting updates coming soon which will make playing in-store even easier!

Thanks for playing! To always ensure you have the best experience with the Lott App we bring updates to the App Store regularly. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on - we’ll always highlight any new features for you in the App.
We’ve squashed a bug around Subscriptions that were creating the wrong entry upon purchase. Thanks for your patience.

This version has a Lott of new features for those of you who love to play in-store!

· Save space in your wallet with a digital version of your Membership Card – either login to your membership account or scan your physical card to add it to the Lott App, ready for registering entries and claiming prizes next time you’re in-store.
· Favourites at your fingertips – we’ve given Favourites an update and you’ll now find them easily in the bottom navigation. Choose to play or manage your online and in-store Favourites all in the one place.
· Manage prizes won in-store – if you forget to claim your prize in-store, you can choose to have it paid into your membership account, or into a bank account of your choosing.
· Renew your membership in-App – never miss the benefits of your membership by renewing quickly on the go when you need.

We hope you enjoy this latest update of the Lott App and look forward to bringing you more exciting updates in the future!
Just a Lott of little improvements since our latest feature release – we hope you’re enjoying the new and improved Favourites and digital Membership Card!

Thanks for playing! To always ensure you have the best experience with the Lott App we bring updates to the App Store regularly. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on - we’ll always highlight any new features for you in the App.
Houston, we had a problem with launching the Lott App, which we’ve now fixed. Liftoff!

Our Home Screen has a new look! Scan My Ticket is now faster to locate and we’ve included a link to SyndiMate, making it easier for you to create your own Syndicate with friends, work mates and family.

For players who don’t log into the Lott App we’ll now save your jurisdiction for next time, meaning you won’t have to choose it each time the App launches.

Thanks for playing with the Lott App. We look forward to bringing you more updates very soon!

Thanks to your feedback we’ve made a few tweaks to the App with this Release:
• We’ve added an instructional overlay to help with scanning your tickets
• When depositing funds we’ve now defaulted your first Debit/Credit Card to display
 
We’ve also fixed a bug when checking Lotto Strike tickets using the App.  We look forward to bringing you more updates very soon!
We've made a quick fix for customers who have multiple Credit/Debit cards in their account. Thanks for your patience!

Ever wondered how many numbers you needed to win a prize? Winning Combinations are now available when viewing the results for a specific draw. We've also refreshed the look and feel of our draw division screens as they were looking a bit tired.

We hope you enjoy this latest update of the Lott App and look forward to bringing you more exciting updates in the future!

Based on your feedback we've added an Edit function to make it easier to delete tickets from the Cart. We've also included details on how to deposit funds into your account using BPAY and Direct Deposit.
Thanks for playing with the Lott App. We look forward to bringing you more updates very soon!

Thanks for playing! To ensure you have the best experience with the Lott App we bring updates to the App Store regularly. To make sure you don't miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on - we'll always highlight any new features for your in the App.

We've made a Lott of little improvements to the "Scan Your Ticket" function... we’ve fixed an issue where the wrong barcode on your ticket was able to be scanned, as well as making it easier to know if you’ve won a prize now. We hope you enjoy this latest update and look forward to bringing you more exciting updates in the future!
We've resolved an issue for some players filtering their ticket history. Thanks for playing with The Lott app.
We’ve made a Lott of little performance enhancements to our deposit screens. Thanks for playing with The Lott app.
